Text:
Hell no. To think of soiling a violently bloody clean 3 hour film with several minutes some horrible horrible nasty sexual acts, what where they thinking!

Yes, that was a bit of the good old sarcasm there, sorry.. ;) 

Thanks though, great compatible format, spec and all on this.
it is about 1 second out of sync. other than that it's perfect, great quality and the sound is great too apart from that sync thingy. anyone know of a quick way to fix the problem?
